overview.business_description: French global automotive supplier. Focus on electrification, ADAS, lighting systems, and thermal management. Operations across 33 countries.
business_positives: Technology leadership in ADAS and electrification
Strong position in EV thermal management
overview.fatal_flaw: Lost investment grade status (Moody's downgrade Sep 2024); European auto weakness; customer concentration
overview.recent_news: Moody's downgraded to Ba1 from Baa3 (Sep 2024) - fallen angel. Net debt reduced €215m to €3.8bn. Issued €850m green bond (Apr 2024).

credit_opinion.summary: Valeo is a fallen angel after Moody's downgrade in Sep 2024. Despite low leverage (1.3x), auto sector headwinds and margin pressure drove the downgrade. Both agencies maintain negative outlooks.
key_risks: Further downgrades possible with negative outlooks
High R&D costs for technology leadership
key_catalysts: Auto production recovery would stabilize ratings
EV thermal management market share gains
credit_opinion.recommendation: UNDERWEIGHT - Fallen angel with negative momentum
